import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent{ isSidebarOpen = false; toggleSidebar() { this.isSidebarOpen = !this.isSidebarOpen; } }
